sentence.Network_en: He had inherited an organization, or rather a congeries of organizations.
sentence.Network_cn: 他继承了一个组织, 或者不如说一大堆组织.

I'm not afraid of facts , I welcome facts but a congeries of facts is not equivalent to an idea .我不恐惧事实真相。我欢迎事实但是一堆事实不等同一个主意。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin congeries 'heap, pile', from congerere 'heap up'

means.word_mean: 1. a sum total of many heterogenous things taken together
